arts.ttl: Rennes predicted XI v Lyon: Ludovic Blas could start
arts.sum: Stade Rennais could welcome Ludovic Blas back to the starting line-up for their trip to face Olympique Lyonnais on Saturday evening. Blas had missed five weeks with a thigh injury…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Rennes: Corentin Tolisso to start, Nemanja Matić returns
arts.sum: Less than a week after what was a suspected season-ending injury for Corentin Tolisso, the Frenchman is expected to start for Olympique Lyonnais tonight when they face Stade Rennais. Tolisso…
